<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Prajhin Sai Aquatics - Premium Fish Market</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@700&family=Outfit:wght@300;400;600&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
        :root {
            --ocean-deep: #0a2463; --ocean-mid: #1e5f8c; --ocean-light: #3e92cc;
            --foam: #ffffff; --sand: #fffacd; --coral: #ff6b6b;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Outfit', sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--ocean-deep) 0%, var(--ocean-mid) 50%, var(--ocean-light) 100%);
            min-height: 100vh; color: var(--foam); overflow-x: hidden; position: relative;
        }
        .bubble {
            position: fixed; bottom: -100px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 50%; animation: rise 15s infinite ease-in; z-index: 1;
        }
        @keyframes rise { to { bottom: 110%; transform: translateX(100px); } }
        header {
            background: rgba(10, 36, 99, 0.9); backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            padding: 1.5rem 2rem; position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 100;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        .header-content {
            max-width: 1400px; margin: 0 auto; display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 1rem;
        }
        .logo-section { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; }
        .logo {
            width: 80px; height: 80px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover;
            border: 3px solid var(--ocean-light); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(62, 146, 204, 0.5);
        }
        h1 {
            font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif; font-size: 2.5rem;
            color: var(--foam); text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        .tagline { font-size: 0.9rem; color: var(--ocean-light); font-weight: 300; }
        .header-actions { display: flex; gap: 1rem; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; }
        .social-links { display: flex; gap: 1rem; align-items: center; }
        .social-btn {
            display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem; padding: 0.7rem 1.2rem;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); border-radius: 25px;
            color: var(--foam); text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .social-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        .cart-btn {
            position: relative; background: var(--coral); border: none; 
            padding: 0.7rem 1.5rem; border-radius: 25px; color: white; 
            font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem;
        }
        .cart-btn:hover {
            background: #ff5252; transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.4);
        }
        .cart-badge {
            position: absolute; top: -8px; right: -8px; background: white;
            color: var(--coral); border-radius: 50%; width: 24px; height: 24px;
            display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: bold; border: 2px solid var(--coral);
        }
        .admin-btn {
            background: var(--ocean-light); border: none; padding: 0.7rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 25px; color: white; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .admin-btn:hover {
            background: var(--ocean-mid); transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(30, 95, 140, 0.4);
        }
        .container { max-width: 1400px; margin: 3rem auto; padding: 0 2rem 5rem; position: relative; z-index: 10; }
        .product-grid {
            display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem; margin-top: 2rem;
        }
        .product-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95); border-radius: 20px; overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease; color: var(--ocean-deep);
        }
        .product-card:hover { transform: translateY(-10px); box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); }
        .product-image-container { width: 100%; height: 250px; overflow: hidden; }
        .product-image { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; transition: transform 0.3s ease; }
        .product-card:hover .product-image { transform: scale(1.1); }
        .product-info { padding: 1.5rem; }
        .product-name { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; color: var(--ocean-deep); }
        .product-description { font-size: 0.95rem; color: #555; margin-bottom: 1rem; line-height: 1.5; }
        .product-price { font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--coral); margin-bottom: 1rem; }
        .currency { font-size: 1.3rem; }
        .add-to-cart-btn {
            width: 100%; padding: 0.8rem; background: var(--ocean-light);
            color: white; border: none; border-radius: 10px; font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; font-size: 1rem;
        }
        .add-to-cart-btn:hover {
            background: var(--ocean-mid); transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(30, 95, 140, 0.3);
        }
        .cart-modal, .admin-panel, .password-modal {
            display: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); z-index: 2000; overflow-y: auto;
        }
        .modal-content, .cart-content, .admin-content, .password-content {
            max-width: 800px; margin: 2rem auto; background: white;
            border-radius: 20px; padding: 2rem; color: var(--ocean-deep);
        }
        .password-content { max-width: 400px; width: 90%; }
        .modal-header, .cart-header, .admin-header {
            display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 2rem; border-bottom: 2px solid var(--ocean-light); padding-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        .close-btn {
            background: var(--coral); border: none; padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 10px; color: white; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600;
        }
        .cart-items { margin-bottom: 2rem; max-height: 400px; overflow-y: auto; }
        .cart-item {
            display: flex; gap: 1rem; padding: 1rem; background: #f5f5f5;
            border-radius: 10px; margin-bottom: 1rem; align-items: center;
        }
        .cart-item-image {
            width: 80px; height: 80px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 10px;
        }
        .cart-item-info { flex: 1; }
        .cart-item-name { font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
        .cart-item-price { color: var(--coral); font-weight: 600; }
        .cart-item-controls {
            display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        .quantity-controls {
            display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem;
        }
        .quantity-btn {
            background: var(--ocean-light); color: white; border: none;
            width: 30px; height: 30px; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: bold; transition: all 0.3s ease; font-size: 1.2rem;
        }
        .quantity-btn:hover { background: var(--ocean-mid); }
        .quantity { font-weight: 600; min-width: 30px; text-align: center; }
        .remove-btn {
            background: var(--coral); color: white; border: none;
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600; transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .remove-btn:hover { background: #ff5252; }
        .cart-summary {
            background: #f9f9f9; padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        .cart-total {
            display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;
            font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--ocean-deep);
            margin-top: 1rem; padding-top: 1rem; border-top: 2px solid #ddd;
        }
        .empty-cart {
            text-align: center; padding: 3rem; color: #999;
        }
        .empty-cart-icon { font-size: 4rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; }
        .payment-options {
            display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem;
        }
        .payment-btn {
            padding: 1rem; border: 2px solid var(--ocean-light); border-radius: 10px;
            background: white; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;
            text-align: left; font-size: 1rem;
        }
        .payment-btn:hover {
            background: var(--ocean-light); color: white; transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(30, 95, 140, 0.3);
        }
        .payment-btn-title { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 1.1rem; }
        .payment-btn-desc { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #666; }
        .payment-btn:hover .payment-btn-desc { color: white; }
        .contact-number {
            font-weight: 700; color: var(--coral); font-size: 1.1rem;
        }
        .payment-btn:hover .contact-number { color: white; }
        .admin-panel { z-index: 1000; }
        .admin-form { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 2rem; }
        .form-group { display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
        .form-group label { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; color: var(--ocean-deep); }
        .form-group input, .form-group textarea {
            padding: 0.8rem; border: 2px solid var(--ocean-light); border-radius: 10px;
            font-family: 'Outfit', sans-serif; font-size: 1rem;
        }
        .form-group textarea { resize: vertical; min-height: 100px; }
        .form-actions { display: flex; gap: 1rem; flex-wrap: wrap; }
        .btn {
            padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; border: none; border-radius: 10px;
            font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .btn-primary { background: var(--ocean-light); color: white; }
        .btn-primary:hover { background: var(--ocean-mid); }
        .btn-secondary { background: #ccc; color: #333; }
        .btn-secondary:hover { background: #999; }
        .product-list { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem; }
        .product-item {
            display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;
            padding: 1rem; background: #f5f5f5; border-radius: 10px; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 1rem;
        }
        .product-item-info { flex: 1; min-width: 200px; }
        .product-item-actions { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; }
        .btn-edit { background: var(--ocean-light); color: white; }
        .btn-delete { background: var(--coral); color: white; }
        .password-modal {
            z-index: 2500;
            justify-content: center; align-items: center;
        }
        .password-content h2 { color: var(--ocean-deep); margin-bottom: 1rem; }
        .password-content input {
            width: 100%; padding: 0.8rem; border: 2px solid var(--ocean-light);
            border-radius: 10px; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-size: 1rem;
        }
        .waves { position: fixed; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 150px; z-index: 5; pointer-events: none; }
        @keyframes wave { 0% { transform: translateX(0); } 50% { transform: translateX(-25%); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); } }
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; }
            .logo { width: 60px; height: 60px; }
            .header-content { justify-content: center; text-align: center; }
            .header-actions, .social-links { flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: center; }
            .product-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .cart-item { flex-direction: column; text-align: center; }
            .cart-item-controls { flex-direction: column; width: 100%; }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="bubble" style="left: 10%; width: 40px; height: 40px; animation-delay: 0s;"></div>
    <div class="bubble" style="left: 20%; width: 20px; height: 20px; animation-delay: 2s;"></div>
    <div class="bubble" style="left: 35%; width: 50px; height: 50px; animation-delay: 4s;"></div>
    <div class="bubble" style="left: 50%; width: 30px; height: 30px; animation-delay: 1s;"></div>
    <div class="bubble" style="left: 70%; width: 35px; height: 35px; animation-delay: 3s;"></div>
    <div class="bubble" style="left: 80%; width: 25px; height: 25px; animation-delay: 5s;"></div>
    <div class="bubble" style="left: 90%; width: 45px; height: 45px; animation-delay: 2.5s;"></div>

    <header>
        <div class="header-content">
            <div class="logo-section">
                <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Prajhin Sai Aquatics Logo" class="logo">
                <div>
                    <h1>Prajhin Sai Aquatics</h1>
                    <p class="tagline">Premium Quality Fish Market</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="header-actions">
                <div class="social-links">
                    <a href="https://instagram.com/prajhin_sai_betas" target="_blank" class="social-btn">
                        <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor">
                            <path d="M12 2.163c3.204 0 3.584.012 4.85.07 3.252.148 4.771 1.691 4.919 4.919.058 1.265.069 1.645.069 4.849 0 3.205-.012 3.584-.069 4.849-.149 3.225-1.664 4.771-4.919 4.919-1.266.058-1.644.07-4.85.07-3.204 0-3.584-.012-4.849-.07-3.26-.149-4.771-1.699-4.919-4.92-.058-1.265-.07-1.644-.07-4.849 0-3.204.013-3.583.07-4.849.149-3.227 1.664-4.771 4.919-4.919 1.266-.057 1.645-.069 4.849-.069zm0-2.163c-3.259 0-3.667.014-4.947.072-4.358.2-6.78 2.618-6.98 6.98-.059 1.281-.073 1.689-.073 4.948 0 3.259.014 3.668.072 4.948.2 4.358 2.618 6.78 6.98 6.98 1.281.058 1.689.072 4.948.072 3.259 0 3.668-.014 4.948-.072 4.354-.2 6.782-2.618 6.979-6.98.059-1.28.073-1.689.073-4.948 0-3.259-.014-3.667-.072-4.947-.196-4.354-2.617-6.78-6.979-6.98-1.281-.059-1.69-.073-4.949-.073zm0 5.838c-3.403 0-6.162 2.759-6.162 6.162s2.759 6.163 6.162 6.163 6.162-2.759 6.162-6.163c0-3.403-2.759-6.162-6.162-6.162zm0 10.162c-2.209 0-4-1.79-4-4 0-2.209 1.791-4 4-4s4 1.791 4 4c0 2.21-1.791 4-4 4zm6.406-11.845c-.796 0-1.441.645-1.441 1.44s.645 1.44 1.441 1.44c.795 0 1.439-.645 1.439-1.44s-.644-1.44-1.439-1.44z"/>
                        </svg>
                        Instagram
                    </a>
                    <a href="https://youtube.com/@prajhinsaibetas" target="_blank" class="social-btn">
                        <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor">
                            <path d="M23.498 6.186a3.016 3.016 0 0 0-2.122-2.136C19.505 3.545 12 3.545 12 3.545s-7.505 0-9.377.505A3.017 3.017 0 0 0 .502 6.186C0 8.07 0 12 0 12s0 3.93.502 5.814a3.016 3.016 0 0 0 2.122 2.136c1.871.505 9.376.505 9.376.505s7.505 0 9.377-.505a3.015 3.015 0 0 0 2.122-2.136C24 15.93 24 12 24 12s0-3.93-.502-5.814zM9.545 15.568V8.432L15.818 12l-6.273 3.568z"/>
                        </svg>
                        YouTube
                    </a>
                </div>
                <button class="cart-btn" onclick="openCart()">
                    ðŸ›’ Cart
                    <span class="cart-badge" id="cartBadge">0</span>
                </button>
                <button class="admin-btn" onclick="openPasswordModal()">Admin Panel</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </header>

    <div class="container">
        <div class="product-grid" id="productGrid"></div>
    </div>

    <!-- Cart Modal -->
    <div class="cart-modal" id="cartModal">
        <div class="cart-content">
            <div class="cart-header">
                <h2>ðŸ›’ Your Shopping Cart</h2>
                <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeCart()">Close</button>
            </div>
            <div id="cartItemsContainer"></div>
            <div id="paymentSection" style="display: none;">
                <h3 style="margin-bottom: 1rem;">Choose Payment Method</h3>
                <div class="payment-options">
                    <button class="payment-btn" onclick="selectPayment('cod')">
                        <div class="payment-btn-title">ðŸ’µ Cash on Delivery</div>
                        <div class="payment-btn-desc">Pay when you receive your order at your doorstep.</div>
                    </button>
                    <button class="payment-btn" onclick="selectPayment('online')">
                        <div class="payment-btn-title">ðŸ’³ Online Payment</div>
                        <div class="payment-btn-desc">For online payment, please contact: <span class="contact-number">+91 81243 39528</span></div>
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Password Modal -->
    <div class="password-modal" id="passwordModal">
        <div class="password-content">
            <h2>Admin Access</h2>
            <input type="password" id="passwordInput" placeholder="Enter admin password">
            <div class="form-actions">
                <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="checkPassword()">Login</button>
                <button class="btn btn-secondary" onclick="closePasswordModal()">Cancel</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Admin Panel -->
    <div class="admin-panel" id="adminPanel">
        <div class="admin-content">
            <div class="admin-header">
                <h2>Admin Panel - Manage Products</h2>
                <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeAdmin()">Close</button>
            </div>
            <form class="admin-form" id="productForm" onsubmit="saveProduct(event)">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label>Fish Name</label>
                    <input type="text" id="fishName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label>Price (â‚¹)</label>
                    <input type="number" id="fishPrice" step="0.01" required>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label>Description</label>
                    <textarea id="fishDescription" required></textarea>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label>Image URL</label>
                    <input type="url" id="fishImage" required>
                </div>
                <div class="form-actions">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Save Fish</button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" onclick="clearForm()">Clear</button>
                </div>
            </form>
            <h3 style="margin: 2rem 0 1rem;">Current Products</h3>
            <div class="product-list" id="productList"></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <svg class="waves" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 24 150 28" preserveAspectRatio="none">
        <defs>
            <path id="wave" d="M-160 44c30 0 58-18 88-18s 58 18 88 18 58-18 88-18 58 18 88 18 v44h-352z" />
        </defs>
        <g class="parallax">
            <use href="#wave" x="48" y="0" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)" style="animation: wave 7s cubic-bezier(0.36, 0.45, 0.63, 0.53) infinite;" />
            <use href="#wave" x="48" y="3" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.5)" style="animation: wave 7s cubic-bezier(0.36, 0.45, 0.63, 0.53) -0.125s infinite;" />
            <use href="#wave" x="48" y="5" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" style="animation: wave 9s cubic-bezier(0.36, 0.45, 0.63, 0.53) infinite;" />
        </g>
    </svg>

    <script>
        const ADMIN_PASSWORD = "prahinadmin123";
        let editingId = null;
        let cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('fishCart')) || [];

        const initialProducts = [
            {
                id: 1, name: "Atlantic Salmon", price: 2099,
                description: "Fresh Atlantic salmon, rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Perfect for grilling or baking.",
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574781330855-d0db8cc6a79c?w=500"
            },
            {
                id: 2, name: "Bluefin Tuna", price: 3899,
                description: "Premium bluefin tuna, ideal for sushi and sashimi. Sustainable catch.",
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1599084993091-1cb5c0721cc6?w=500"
            },
            {
                id: 3, name: "King Prawns", price: 2799,
                description: "Jumbo king prawns, succulent and sweet. Great for curries and grills.",
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565680018434-b513d5e5fd47?w=500"
            },
            {
                id: 4, name: "Sea Bass", price: 2399,
                description: "Fresh sea bass with delicate flavor. Perfect for Indian and continental dishes.",
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544943910-4c1dc44aab44?w=500"
            },
            {
                id: 5, name: "Fresh Lobster", price: 4999,
                description: "Live lobster, the ultimate luxury seafood. Perfect for special occasions.",
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1625937286074-9ca519d5d9df?w=500"
            },
            {
                id: 6, name: "Rainbow Trout", price: 1599,
                description: "Farm-raised rainbow trout, tender and flavorful. Excellent source of protein.",
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1534043464124-3be32fe000c9?w=500"
            }
        ];

        if (!localStorage.getItem('fishProducts')) {
            localStorage.setItem('fishProducts', JSON.stringify(initialProducts));
        }

        function loadProducts() {
            const products = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('fishProducts')) || [];
            const grid = document.getElementById('productGrid');
            grid.innerHTML = products.map(product => `
                <div class="product-card">
                    <div class="product-image-container">
                        <img src="${product.image}" alt="${product.name}" class="product-image">
                    </div>
                    <div class="product-info">
                        <h3 class="product-name">${product.name}</h3>
                        <p class="product-description">${product.description}</p>
                        <div class="product-price"><span class="currency">â‚¹</span>${product.price.toFixed(2)}</div>
                        <button class="add-to-cart-btn" onclick="addToCart(${product.id})">
                            Add to Cart
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');
        }

        function updateCartBadge() {
            const totalItems = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0);
            document.getElementById('cartBadge').textContent = totalItems;
        }

        function addToCart(productId) {
            const products = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('fishProducts')) || [];
            const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
            
            const existingItem = cart.find(item => item.id === productId);
            if (existingItem) {
                existingItem.quantity++;
            } else {
                cart.push({ ...product, quantity: 1 });
            }
            
            localStorage.setItem('fishCart', JSON.stringify(cart));
            updateCartBadge();
            alert(`${product.name} added to cart!`);
        }

        function openCart() {
            document.getElementById('cartModal').style.display = 'block';
            renderCart();
        }

        function closeCart() {
            document.getElementById('cartModal').style.display = 'none';
        }

        function renderCart() {
            const container = document.getElementById('cartItemsContainer');
            const paymentSection = document.getElementById('paymentSection');
            
            if (cart.length === 0) {
                container.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="empty-cart">
                        <div class="empty-cart-icon">ðŸ›’</div>
                        <h3>Your cart is empty</h3>
                        <p>Add some delicious fish to get started!</p>
                    </div>
                `;
                paymentSection.style.display = 'none';
                return;
            }

            const total = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.price * item.quantity), 0);

            container.innerHTML = `
                <div class="cart-items">
                    ${cart.map((item, index) => `
                        <div class="cart-item">
                            <img src="${item.image}" alt="${item.name}" class="cart-item-image">
                            <div class="cart-item-info">
                                <div class="cart-item-name">${item.name}</div>
                                <div class="cart-item-price">â‚¹${item.price.toFixed(2)} each</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="cart-item-controls">
                                <div class="quantity-controls">
                                    <button class="quantity-btn" onclick="updateQuantity(${index}, -1)">-</button>
                                    <span class="quantity">${item.quantity}</span>
                                    <button class="quantity-btn" onclick="updateQuantity(${index}, 1)">+</button>
                                </div>
                                <button class="remove-btn" onclick="removeFromCart(${index})">Remove</button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    `).join('')}
                </div>
                <div class="cart-summary">
                    <div class="cart-total">
                        <span>Total:</span>
                        <span>â‚¹${total.toFixed(2)}</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `;
            paymentSection.style.display = 'block';
        }

        function updateQuantity(index, change) {
            cart[index].quantity += change;
            if (cart[index].quantity <= 0) {
                cart.splice(index, 1);
            }
            localStorage.setItem('fishCart', JSON.stringify(cart));
            updateCartBadge();
            renderCart();
        }

        function removeFromCart(index) {
            if (confirm('Remove this item from cart?')) {
                cart.splice(index, 1);
                localStorage.setItem('fishCart', JSON.stringify(cart));
                updateCartBadge();
                renderCart();
            }
        }

        function selectPayment(method) {
            if (method === 'cod') {
                alert('Thank you for your order! We will deliver your fish with Cash on Delivery option. Our team will contact you soon!');
                cart = [];
                localStorage.setItem('fishCart', JSON.stringify(cart));
                updateCartBadge();
                closeCart();
            } else if (method === 'online') {
                alert('For online payment, please contact us at +91 81243 39528. Save your cart and call us to complete the payment!');
            }
        }

        // Admin functions
        function openPasswordModal() {
            document.getElementById('passwordModal').style.display = 'flex';
            document.getElementById('passwordInput').value = '';
            document.getElementById('passwordInput').focus();
        }

        function closePasswordModal() {
            document.getElementById('passwordModal').style.display = 'none';
        }

        function checkPassword() {
            const password = document.getElementById('passwordInput').value;
            if (password === ADMIN_PASSWORD) {
                closePasswordModal();
                openAdmin();
            } else {
                alert('Incorrect password!');
            }
        }

        document.getElementById('passwordInput').addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
            if (e.key === 'Enter') checkPassword();
        });

        function openAdmin() {
            document.getElementById('adminPanel').style.display = 'block';
            loadAdminProducts();
        }

        function closeAdmin() {
            document.getElementById('adminPanel').style.display = 'none';
            clearForm();
        }

        function loadAdminProducts() {
            const products = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('fishProducts')) || [];
            const list = document.getElementById('productList');
            list.innerHTML = products.map(product => `
                <div class="product-item">
                    <div class="product-item-info">
                        <strong>${product.name}</strong> - â‚¹${product.price.toFixed(2)}
                        <br><small>${product.description.substring(0, 50)}...</small>
                    </div>
                    <div class="product-item-actions">
                        <button class="btn btn-edit" onclick="editProduct(${product.id})">Edit</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-delete" onclick="deleteProduct(${product.id})">Delete</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');
        }

        function saveProduct(event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            const products = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('fishProducts')) || [];
            const product = {
                id: editingId || Date.now(),
                name: document.getElementById('fishName').value,
                price: parseFloat(document.getElementById('fishPrice').value),
                description: document.getElementById('fishDescription').value,
                image: document.getElementById('fishImage').value
            };

            if (editingId) {
                const index = products.findIndex(p => p.id === editingId);
                products[index] = product;
                editingId = null;
            } else {
                products.push(product);
            }

            localStorage.setItem('fishProducts', JSON.stringify(products));
            loadProducts();
            loadAdminProducts();
            clearForm();
            alert('Product saved successfully!');
        }

        function editProduct(id) {
            const products = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('fishProducts')) || [];
            const product = products.find(p => p.id === id);
            if (product) {
                editingId = id;
                document.getElementById('fishName').value = product.name;
                document.getElementById('fishPrice').value = product.price;
                document.getElementById('fishDescription').value = product.description;
                document.getElementById('fishImage').value = product.image;
                window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
            }
        }

        function deleteProduct(id) {
            if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this product?')) {
                let products = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('fishProducts')) || [];
                products = products.filter(p => p.id !== id);
                localStorage.setItem('fishProducts', JSON.stringify(products));
                loadProducts();
                loadAdminProducts();
            }
        }

        function clearForm() {
            editingId = null;
            document.getElementById('productForm').reset();
        }

        // Initialize
        loadProducts();
        updateCartBadge();
    </script>
</body>
</html>
